title: Fourth Year Triumphs at Trebizon
description: 'Holly Thomas!' Rebecca gasped.At the time it seemed such a good idea to help the shy First Year girl with the limp by taking her on their first run. But as the summer term at Trebizon school passes, Rebecca, Sue and Tish find that their concern for Holly backfires in more ways than one.Then a film crew arrives to make a documentary about the school, even filming Rebecca's longed for tennis match with Joss Vining. But no one realizes who the glamorous Miss Angel really is until the crew has gone!
author: Anne Digby
